entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:46 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 02:44 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
